settings.escapeHatchDescription: Force your withdrawal via a censorship resistant transaction on Ethereum.
settings.easyModeDescription: Let us handle the extra transactions so you can set 'n forget.

activity.error:
Sorry! We're unable to pull your activity feed.

confirmationModal.opDescription: Withdrawing is a 3 step process, requiring 2 {{base}} transactions.
confirmationModal.arbDescription: Withdrawing is a 2 step process and requires an extra {{base}} transaction.
confirmationModal.checkbox1Cctp: I understand it will take ~{{mins}} mins until my funds are claimable on {{to}}
confirmationModal.checkbox1Deposit: I understand it will take ~{{mins}} mins until my funds are on {{rollup}}
confirmationModal.opCheckbox1WithdrawalDays: I understand it will take ~{{days}} days until my funds are claimable on {{base}} after I prove my withdrawal
confirmationModal.opCheckbox1WithdrawalHours: I understand it will take ~{{hours}} hours until my funds are claimable on {{base}} after I prove my withdrawal
confirmationModal.arbCheckbox1WithdrawalDays: I understand it will take ~{{days}} days until my funds are claimable on {{base}}
confirmationModal.arbCheckbox1WithdrawalHours: I understand it will take ~{{hours}} hours until my funds are claimable on {{base}}
confirmationModal.checkbox2Deposit: I understand once a deposit is initiated it cannot be sped up or cancelled
confirmationModal.checkbox2Withdrawal: I understand once a withdrawal is initiated it cannot be sped up or cancelled
confirmationModal.checkbox3: I understand network fees are approximate and will change
